title: HIPAA Compliance Audit
description: An analyst must audit access logs for a database containing patient data to ensure only authorized medical personnel have accessed it.

tasks.description: Retrieve all access logs for the patient database for the last 90 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully gathers the required audit evidence.

tasks.description: Correlate the access logs with a list of authorized medical personnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst performs the correlation to check for unauthorized access.

tasks.description: Identify several instances where IT administrators accessed the database without a valid support ticket and flag this as a HIPAA compliance violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies and documents a compliance failure.
